Package datasource

package datasource
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    DatabaseConnection
    This class manages the database connection using JPA's EntityManager and EntityManagerFactory.
    ImageHandling
    This class handles image-related operations, including uploading images to an external API (ImgBB) and parsing the response to retrieve the image URL.
    NoteDAO
    Data Access Object (DAO) for managing `Note` entities in the database.
    UserDAO
    Data Access Object (DAO) for managing `User` entities in the database.
